description: unbound booklet sent as Christmas card; printed with inkjet printer; cover has abstract, smeared design in yelow, gray, cerulian green, and blue; title sketched with ballpoint pen, and paint; pages contain black and white drawings and text; comes with original mailing envelope and letter from artist; lender's archive # 86
medium: Xerox, collage, and archival adhesive, with typing
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: B Marjoram │ Dec │ 2007
title: "For the Few," Alphabet (second variation)
